item.title: Semaglutide Research Kits - Janoshik Verified 99.2% Purity
item.description: Premium Semaglutide research kits for scientific studies. Each kit contains 10 vials x 10mg. Third-party tested by Janoshik showing 99.2% purity. Professional cold-chain storage maintained.
item.dc:creator: Sigma Audley Quality Team
item.content:encoded:
Our Semaglutide research kits are perfect for metabolic research studies. Each batch is independently tested by Janoshik Analytical, ensuring consistent quality for your research applications.

Learn more: Semaglutide Research Details

item.title: Tirzepatide Research Peptides - Triple Agonist Innovation
item.description: Advanced Tirzepatide research peptides for cutting-edge metabolic studies. Dual GIP/GLP-1 receptor agonist. Available in multiple concentrations. Janoshik tested for research applications.
item.dc:creator: Sigma Audley Research Division
item.content:encoded:
Tirzepatide represents the next generation of metabolic research tools. Our research-grade Tirzepatide enables groundbreaking studies into dual hormone pathway mechanisms.

Explore: Tirzepatide Research Options
